data.text: @EricTopol @rustyrockets @guardian @YouTube Yes, but it doesn’t provide protection to all population, zero covid that China is the best (still pursuing).:)

@winfordwnt @EricTopol @rustyrockets @guardian @YouTube The affirmation of the confirmation bias of the C19 anti-vaxxer is in itself another public health issue; in regards to mental health. Anti-vaxxers have been kicked off organ donor lists & still feel they’re right. Is 🇺🇸 respecting or neglecting rights of victims of manipulation?

@MickieThePoet @EricTopol @rustyrockets @guardian @YouTube Nuanced? What's nuanced about the video title? 😂 Seriously. Russell Brand fans are like Trump fans. They're not looking for balanced and different perspectives. They want their egos massaged & told they're right for thinking what they think. Brand does it to a tee

@EricTopol @rustyrockets @guardian @YouTube Do you see the title of the video: "The narrative is collapsing". Brand is a hippy Alex Jones. A toxic youtuber who has been every bit as destructive in covid discourse as Malone & McCullough. Cherrypicks the hell out of studies. I'm guessing you don't watch many of his videos
@wheresann @EricTopol @rustyrockets @guardian @YouTube I guess you're right. The comments were not relevant to the discussion, and were basically taken as a validation for never getting vaccinated

@winfordwnt @EricTopol @rustyrockets @guardian @YouTube It is about using words that immediately pacify the non vax tribe… unfortunately it is similar to leaving a loaded gun in the same room as a toddler. You cant use words like natural immunity when an entire political party will weaponize the words and disable Americans.
